attributes.action: Enforce pay cuts to footballers during the COVID-19 pandemic
attributes.additional_details: Get the FA to step in
attributes.background: I want the gvt to step in and direct the FA to demand clubs cut footballers salaries during the COVID- 19 pandemic. These players are earning disgusting weekly salaries and the NHS is on its knees and the staff are putting THEIR lives at risk whilst the footballers stay at home drinking Moët!

rejection.details:
The Government is not responsible for setting or stopping the pay of particular privately employed workers.

We have published a petition calling on the Government to increase taxes on high earners to fund emergency Budget measures, which you might like to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305795

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
